message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR 

This paper belongs to the Natural Language Processing (NLP) field, which is covered by several arXiv CS sub-categories. The paper deals with detecting novelty in documents, which involves techniques such as text classification, information retrieval, machine learning, and data mining. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which covers topics related to NLP and computational linguistics. The other likely sub-categories are cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CR (Cryptography and Security), as they also cover topics related to the techniques used in the paper.
